website_summaries.verdict: An impressive design, comfortable support, and long warranty make this bath pillow an outstanding value.
pros: Has two spacious panels for excellent support of the upper back, shoulders, neck, and head
Material is soft and easy to wipe clean
cons: May not adhere to all bathtubs, and suction cups may not adhere at all times when bathing

customer_reviews.title: I loved this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pillow. It was amazing to lay back and relax with a book in the bath without hurting my neck. Unfortunately my cats viciously attacked it and ripped it apart, but I really loved it while I had it. Would order again, and hide when not using.
customer_reviews.author: Ming's Mongols Cattery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect even for a small tub
customer_reviews.text: So if your like me who lives in an apartment you know the bath has little to offer. I was hesitant buying this product knowing I didn't have a head ledge for the top bend to really rest on. But after putting it in my tub and soaking in a long deserved bath(with a black bath bomb as seen in the pic) this item was just what I needed. No stiff neck or sore back. Easy to place and clean. This is something I'll recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Ruble

customer_reviews.title: L@@ked For Something Like This For Years!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Have A Nautilus Tub And Never Could Solve The Head Rest Issue. This Is So Terrific I Stayed In The Tub For Over An Hour! (No I Didn't Drown....But I Did Think I Died And Went To Heaven! LOL!)
customer_reviews.author: C. Hackman

customer_reviews.title: performs exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been looking for a bath pillow for some time, we've tried a few over the years but none of them quite did the job. This Gorilla Grip pillow did the trick. Did not give it a durability rating as we just got it and it's only been used twice, but by the looks of the material it should last a long time and with their guarantee and replacement policy, my recommendation is to go for it.
customer_reviews.author: aknrs

customer_reviews.title: Daily bath taker gives this two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: We've tried a variety of bath pillows in our household and this has been the most comfortable. We only have a small ledge between the top of the tub and the back of the shower wall, but the extra pillow to go over the ledge makes a huge difference in comfort. It also isn't getting mildewy easily like others we've had. Stays clean. Would recommend over other bath pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Shawkins

customer_reviews.title: For best results, get two :)
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy bath pillow and it does stay stuck. If you have a deeper tub with a slanted back for reclining, and you're in for a long soak, you will want more than a neck pillow since there's that big gap behind your back needing support. I tried attaching the pillow low in the tub like a lumbar pillow but it was too buoyant and just shimmied its way upward to the water level. So I bought a second one. The upper one stops the lower one from escaping.
customer_reviews.author: dogpal

customer_reviews.title: Comfy bath pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant, unsure it would work properly in my bath as it has a very small ledge. This stuck nicely and worked fantastic. I got the two panel one and it’s wonderful for taking baths. My wife loves it and it really helps you get comfortable when trying to relax in the tub. It doesn’t look as soft/comfy as it is either, it’s very comfortable to lay your head, back or neck against. Highly recommend, now to see how well it holds up!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Kenna

customer_reviews.title: I'm extremely satisfied with this company & product
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is as described. Pure white & built solid with ample suction cups to secure to tub. Actually Inhances the beauty of the bath. The warranty is unmatched with customer service reached out to me on the day it was delivered. I'm confident that if this product fails, it will be a swift replacement or refund. I'm extremely satisfied with this company & product. If you need a bath pillow, this is recommended
customer_reviews.author: kDuncan

customer_reviews.title: Hard, inflexible pillow that doesn’t mold to your neck.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give it less than 5 stars because it’s description is accurate. Quality is good. However, it will only stick to SMOOTH surfaces. I guess I wasn’t thinking about our tub having a tiny bit of texture. Also, it is inflexible. It is thick, firm and not squishy at all so you feel like your head and neck are propped up in a weird unnatural way. I’d almost prefer the inflatable cheap ones that will conform to your neck shape. I bought 2 based on the reviews and regret it. Should have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Tim from Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Showering while standing is difficult for me, and our bathtub isn't spacious enough for a chair so I bought this bath pillow as an alternative. I've had it for about a year now and it has held up well. The padding has been pressed down a bit, but not very much considering I use it daily. I understand that my usage of this product is not the norm, but if I can sit on it, then I can imagine if you're going to use it as a true spa pillow it will probably hold up even longer.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: Take a bath with this pillow and stay neck pain free!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was a gift from my son for Christmas. It feels perfect and supports my neck which was a problem for me while soaking in the bath. I've had other bath pillows, but this sits perfect against the spots I need it and it's not too bulky. Great gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Essential for Relaxing Bath
customer_reviews.text: This bath tub pillow is perfect for a step up in your bath time routine. The silicone cups stick until you want to take them off and requiring little effort to pull up on the tabs. The pillow is firm but comfy and makes laying your head down on the corner of the tub superior to laying a towel down or simply putting your head on the hard bath tub corners. The pillow also helps me stay in place in the tub as I’m not quite big enough to be able to lay down without floating down all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Hold Up
customer_reviews.text: Terrific, comfortable, & easy to clean! Update: 12/2016 A few months after getting this pillow, it developed a rip for no apparent reason. I contacted the company and received a replacement within a few days. Am very happy with the replacement and the company thus far... Update: 6/2017 Unfortunately, after 6 months of use, the pillow covering has developed serious rips and the inner foam now gets saturated. I am unable to contact the seller for yet another replacement, even though this pillow has a 10-year guarantee. Very disappointed and will be shopping for a bath pillow from another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: clarabel

customer_reviews.title: As my tub is shallower I think it was the right choice and a good fit for it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for bathing as the side of my tub is quite hard and uncomfortable (obviously) and I'm prone to neck pain, soreness, and migraines. This works very well to keep my relaxing bath relaxing and help lessen pain instead of increase it! I did debate between this version and the longer one, and settled on this one. As my tub is shallower I think it was the right choice and a good fit for it, haven't regretted it!
customer_reviews.author: Nan Troxel

customer_reviews.title: 5+ Great Pillow for Jacuzzi Tub With Jets - fits just right
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow, I needed a pillow that would be comfortable and support my neck and head, as well an not cover the jets in the jacuzzi tub. View my image, so you can see how the pillow fits the tub and top edge of tub for a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Nirupa

customer_reviews.title: It's soft and is automatically washed when I clean my ...
customer_reviews.text: It's soft and is automatically washed when I clean my shower, my only issue is that it seems to slip a tiny bit every time I use it so once or twice a month I have to go in and fix it. That's not a big enough deal for it to lose a star for me, though.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: My best friend!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is my best friend on a rough day! Suction cups hold well so pillow stays in place and just where I need it. I use it when I meditate in the tub and I'm able to sit up and relax completely without slipping down into the water. Very comfortable too and easy to dry/clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Blasiman

customer_reviews.title: amazing.
customer_reviews.text: bought this based on a buzzfeed "what's trending on amazon" post and loved it. also purchased a tub drain cover, and have never loved baths more. this doesn't look like much, but is SO comfortable and makes laying in the bath for long periods relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is actually really nice and well made, way different than cheapy bath pillows
customer_reviews.text: It's only a bath pillow, right? This is actually a really nice bath pillow that stays in place and is a denser material than any others I've had. The design is really nice for laying your head back too. Plus, it's wide enough for my shoulders and deep enough to cushion quite a bit of my back. Really comfortable. I'll never go back to buying cheap $6 bath pillows from wally world again - this is night and day.
customer_reviews.author: lisajotheshoppinghoTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Stays where you put it and dries quickly
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to fit onto my old school apartment bathtub. I used to use a folded up towel that would inevitably get soaked, but this material is comfortable and waterproof and easily dries when I'm done. The biggest thing is that it stays where I put it and I can move around and not worry about it slipping down.
customer_reviews.author: H. Storm

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly as you’d imagine it to be. Lol I’ve had it a few months now and so far it’s held up nicely. It’s super easy to clean and doesn’t get gross if you keep it in your shower area. (For me at least) It’s pretty comfortable and you don’t have to worry about it getting disgusting or moldy like ones that have a fabric covering.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Actually stays on
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know if this would adhere to my curved acrylic tub, but it stays great. It actually doesn't need every single suction cup stuck down to stay in place. Also very easy to clean and don't feel like it gets gross from water exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Murray fam

customer_reviews.title: Best bath-time purchase I've made...
customer_reviews.text: This was the best thing I purchased for my new-found love of bath taking. I don't know what else to say...the suction cups are pretty strong, so you'll want to slide them up and off of the tub, rather than just pulling, otherwise you'll pop them out of the pillow. It's comfortable, and easy to wipe down when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: ThePeachMartini

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This sticks to our tub surprisingly well and it’s really comfortable. I used rubbing alcohol to clean the tub and tile service to attach, then followed the directions on the package. It hasn’t budged an inch.
customer_reviews.author: Alina P

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It does as advertised. Super easy to clean, small enough to tuck away when it gets in the way, & the material is comfortable enough to relax against in the tub. *Almost 2 years after purchasing & the suction cups are still fully functioning.*
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Quinn

customer_reviews.title: This pillow works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love taking baths, but I have always dreaded that moment when you lean back onto that cold surface. With this bath pillow, that is no longer a worry; it has stayed firmly fastened to the back of my tub through multiple baths. I am so happy with this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable soaks in the tub
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love it. It makes epsom salt soaking in the tub more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kenobi-San

customer_reviews.title: This a really great, easy-to-care-for bath pillow
customer_reviews.text: This a really great, easy-to-care-for bath pillow. The suction cups hold well, it doesn't slip during use, and it's not a pain to remove it from the tub either. It's SO much better than rolling a towel up for bath-time; very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Wouldn't change a thing.
customer_reviews.text: I take baths 3-4 times a week. I have tried inflatable bath pillows and didn't like them because they always tend to slide up out of the water. This bath pillow is perfect. It's a great size, the suction cups are big and really strong, and the pillow almost never slides when I'm using it. I highly recommend this pillow for those who love to take baths. Editing to add: make sure to wipe down after each use to help prevent mold.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna.Leann

customer_reviews.title: Works great with any bathtub
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have much of a lip on the back of my tub so this worked out great. Even if you have a flat wall at the back of your tub this is a great pillow. The suction cups are nice and hold well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Best bath pillow I've found.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many bath pillows. This is by FAR the best. It is comfortable and the suction cups hold it in place. I have had no problem with mildew or odors, a common problem in earlier pillows I purchased. I always removed them after my bath and reattached them to the tub enclosure high enough so they could dry. In spite of this, the earlier products developed mildew, when the seams split a tiny bit and allowed water in. I love this product! A very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From The Disabled
customer_reviews.text: Best pillow I've purchased. Best grip out there. Have broken neck and back. This is second purchase to have softness at my lower back. Would not waste another dime searching after finding the Gorilla Grip. Now I bathe comfortably from neck to butt, no pun intended. Thanks for this great product for those of us in a disabled capacity. I now enjoy soaking my broken body in comfort, not tensed up. You have no idea how these have changed my life. One thousand thank yous!
customer_reviews.author: CBR in Missouri

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand why it is ripped and suction cups are bad, only after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Pillow broke after owning it for only 3 months... All we do is keep it in the bath tub and lay on it. But some how there is a tear in the base of the pillow now, so water and mold get in. And the suction cups are slipping now. I just want to clarify, that all we have done is lay on it. It has literally just sat in the tub since I gave it to my wife as a Christmas present, and all she has done is lay on it. I don't understand why it is ripped and suction cups are bad, only after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Much better than rolling a towel behind my neck and worrying about it getting wet. Suction cups work well. Even though the top piece doesn't really work the way it is suppose to because my tub doesn't have a large enough overhang it is still great!
customer_reviews.author: Dhhteacher95

customer_reviews.title: Great bath pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this gorilla grip bath pillow! I have had it since December 2015 and it shows no wear. It stays in place and the material doesn't feel cold when you lean against it. It is a comfy bath pillow
customer_reviews.author: MELANIE B

customer_reviews.title: Hands down THE BEST of its kind!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the most practical and comfortable bath pillow I've ever seen!! This is the ONLY one I have found that really works, stays in place, no air involved, easy to keep clean..........I can't say enough!
customer_reviews.author: DIY Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Will never bathe without this again.
customer_reviews.text: I got the three-section one. How did I take baths for over thirty years without using one of these?! Sooo comfy. No more sore shoulders or neck from pressing against the tub and wall, no more tension headaches from holding my head at a weird angle. The suction cups work really well--this thing doesn't budge once I'm lying back. My bathtub has almost no ledge between the head of the tub and the shower stall wall, so I was concerned that the head part of the pillow would get in the way, but it really doesn't, so I would recommend this even for people who have small baths like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Best brand for bath pillow
customer_reviews.text: I had the shorter one for over 5 years. The previous one arrived with a hole, but I loved it so much I kept it. Eventually needed replacing due to age, so naturally I got the one I really wanted, the longer one. Worth the extra money. High quality support. Comfortable Dense filler! Best one I've used. Great for long bath.. Good head support, especially on longer version.. Effective suction cups. Actually, suction cups are difficult to remove. Just follow directions for suction cups for good adherence and for proper removal to avoid damaging product.
customer_reviews.author: American Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable but Backed by Good Warranty and Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pillow for my wife two and half years ago. It started ripping at the seam that holds the two cushions less than a year into its use. The pillow was still usable all this time but last week, the rip finally exposed the foam inside one of the cushions and it started taking on water, soaking the foam. So we had to throw it away. I remembered the 10-year limited warranty so I wrote to Hills Point Industries on Friday. I received a reply back the following day. And after providing the Amazon order number and our shipping address, we received a new identical pillow today, exactly a week later. Very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Paper Napkin

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable and good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who likes to take long baths after his workday. He loves it--has to have it for every bath. We have that circular drain 'thingy" right on the side of the tub where he wants to sit and this covers it up nicely so he can't feel it behind his back.
customer_reviews.author: KHsuperwomanTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: While I did have a teensy but of trouble getting all of the suction cups to stick, enough adhered to the tub to keep the pillow from slipping. For deeper tubs, a slightly longer length pillow would have been nice, but this one worked well. The material wasn't all that comfortable compared to some of the fabric-covered ones I've used in the past, but for the price, I'd recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my wife, but I have to admit, when I take a bath, it's very nice and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Hays

customer_reviews.title: Happy bath time!
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar style/shape bath pillow for years that was not very water tight (meaning water got inside), and it developed discoloration and mildew. It also didn't hold very well. This pillow has NONE of those problems. It's very water tight, nice and light, and it sticks right on the bath back. I also don't really have a lip on the bath, and it's fine--It just sits flat on the back, no problems. It makes bath time much more comfy. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: alpal

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, will just come apart.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in hopes that it would last longer than the blowup ones that would start to leak. I was highly dissatisfied as it only lasted a few weeks. The suction cups are plenty strong. They give you instructions on how to remove them from the tub surface so the do not come out of the back of the cushion. However just the pressure from moving in the bathtub causes enough friction for them to pop out. Within a few uses all the suction cups come out and the product is no longer usable.
customer_reviews.author: WinterISSnowing

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this pillow. I'm pregnant and was looking for some relief when I lean back against the hard tub. I take baths twice a day if possible. I was so excited to receive this product but I could tell immediately that it wasn't going to provide much support for me. It is flimsy, hard and will not stay suctioned as I move around. I should've just gone with a thicker air pillow or something totally different. This is not worth what I paid. My husband couldn't believe how much we paid for this!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Stuck there and hasn't moved, which is perfect. Hope cleaning ladies don't try to release and put back. Previous back rest would stick till I moved a bit in tub, then slowly slide down wall. Maybe trick is never move. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: A. Duran

customer_reviews.title: I actually really like this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like this pillow, it’s comfortable. I bought this because my bathrub doesn’t really slouch down so I can’t lay my back against the front of the tub because the back is arched straight & it’s super uncomfortable. (I hope that makes sense) anyways this pillow really helps things be more comfortable the only issue I have with it is it slides when I start using things with soap like my body wash. I guess the soap makes it slippery, I don’t know but that’s the only thing I have a problem with everything else is fine. I honestly wish it didn’t do that though.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: It Floats!!!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is perfect size, could be thicker in the head rest area. Big issue for me is it floats, so it’s constantly sliding up the wall of my tub. The suction cups stay stuck to the wall, they just slide up due to the flotation of the pillow. It only stays in place while I’m laying on it, once I raise up it floats up. I also have to pull it down and to get it low enough to lay on. Not too happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Frannie

customer_reviews.title: Much more relaxing baths are in my future!
customer_reviews.text: My tub is set in and there is a wall which makes reclining a little uncomfortable. The Gorilla Grip pillow adheres strongly to both the polished granite wall and the side of the tub, making a nice cushion for my shoulders and head. The price was right and the suction cups are strong. It does seem like it might be absorbing water, so I'm not sure how to deal with that but I think it will be fine. I take it out of the tub after each use so it can dry and not develop mold under the cups.
customer_reviews.author: Anna C

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bath pillow! I don't think I'll ever need to buy another, very high quality, but if I do, it will be this same exact one. I'm definitely done with the inflatable kind now, feeling a little spoiled! I like that I can bend the neck part or have it straight up and down. It's versatile for whatever position I want to rest in. Very easy to clean too. Pleased with this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: It’s not only for a bathtub..... see video!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! And now I need one more. I use my for my new outdoor hot tub and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Must have for bath lovers
customer_reviews.text: Do wish it provided a bit more back support (don't recommend if that's what you're looking for) but otherwise it's great. Very impressed by how well this sticks to my bathtub! I was expecting it to just slide right off like other suction cup bath stuff I've tried in the past but it actually sticks... Sometimes a little too well - the cups will get pulled right off (but they're easy to put back into place). It's small enough to easily fit under the sink cabinet and dries very quickly/is easy to wipe dry. Already recommended this to a coworker that frequently takes baths, too.
customer_reviews.author: Lokii

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, supportive
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is a big step up from what I had before. It is large enough to support your head, neck, and upper back. Although it's plastic, it feels nice. I've had two very minor problems. First, the "Gorilla Grip" is so strong that it is difficult to re-position the pillow (this may only apply if you have arthritic fingers). Second, the pillow is meant to lay flat against the side of the tub, so I had some trouble finding the best place to put it in my curved, triangular Jacuzzi tub.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ondrejka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is exactly what I was looking for. It’s got great suction and it is comfortable to relax on. I like the material, it is hard to describe as it doesn’t feel too much like plastic but definitely not a fabric to worry about mold buildup. Update: cats really like to scratch this product. If you have cats hang it high and out of their read here if possible
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well for our spa
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to have a pillow in the hot tub (she tends to nod off late at night). Well, you can't put the hot tub cover down with the pillow suction cupped to the tub, so I took those suction cups off and was just going to bend the pillow over when I close the tub. The problem is the pillow won't stay in place now. Even when the suction cups still adhere to the tub, they slide because of the wet surface. Disappointing and she's stopped using it. Wasted money for us. I think it would work in a bathtub, but they advertised it for hot tubs.
customer_reviews.author: Starman

customer_reviews.title: It stays put
customer_reviews.text: I have my first jacuzzi tub. The pillow is a must for luxurious feel bath
customer_reviews.author: KEAWV

customer_reviews.title: Great bath pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the third time I've purchased this bath pillow. It's the best I've been able to find. Very comfortable. Great support. But-- You have to be careful to loosen the suction cups with a fingernail rather than pulling at them. They will pop off and can't be put back on. You also have to dry it after use. If you don't dry it, mold will form in the crevices. Since I don't always follow my own advice, I replace it once I've lost too many suction cups or I start seeing mold in the crevice.
customer_reviews.author: Wicked Humor

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF HARD EARNED MONEY
customer_reviews.text: SO DISAPPOINTING ☹️ Mine doesn’t stay suctioned... it keeps violently popping up out of the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Mellie

customer_reviews.title: Really love this bath pillow
customer_reviews.text: Really love this bath pillow. I have a standard tub in my apartment with very little space between the tub edge to the wall where my neck goes, and even without a proper space for the top half of the pillow to rest, I can still maneuver it around and enjoy the pillow. My bath time has changed into a completely different experience with this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Suction is Not Great

The pillow itself is comfy enough, but this is my first purchase of a bath pillow so I don't have anything to compare it to. Even without several of the suction cups, it's still adhering to my tub, but we find ourselves using it less often now that we know it could break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for baths
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute game changer. I had debated on getting this for months and finally caved — best decision! It’s super comfortable as opposed to the hard tub. Only thing is that one of the suction cups on the top doesn’t stick to the wall anymore (have used it about 10ish times maybe?). Doesn’t matter much because the others still work and with the pressure of me leaning against it, it doesn’t go anywhere. If you are debating on getting this — just do it! It will make baths SO much more enjoyable
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Noelle Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great bath pillow

This pillow definitely made a difference. I believe that if I take down gently, because it does sucks strong into the wall, I clean it after use, and let it dry it will last the time is intended to last. Is a great buy that will make your bath time much enjoyable and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Elsy Moran

customer_reviews.title: Super yucky and water logged, but, still putting it to use as long as it happens to be under me when I set my air jets on hig
customer_reviews.text: It was wonderful and perfect when I first got it, suction cups are great! customer_reviews.author: Bluebird

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t grip the bathtub!!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money! It slides up and doesn’t stay on the bathtub! I had a blow up one from target before this one and I honestly enjoyed that cheap one more than this because it never moved around...
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Masterson

customer_reviews.title: The wife just loves it in her whirlpool tub
customer_reviews.text: My tub fits me just right but the wife couldn't touch the end of the tub with her toes. So I bought this and also another bad for her feet. Now she can stay stable when the whirlpool turns on and my life is much better. Also because this is vinyl and not fabric with a net wrap, you are able to easly slide up or down to position yourself. The fabric ones cause you to lean forward every time you want to adjust you position in the tub. Like if your reading your I-Pad etc. Thanks, Mel Lux
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Actually is non-slip
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this bath pillow. It doesn't slip down as you use it which is just what I wanted. Seems to be holding up nicely after 5 uses. Dries well and doesn't seem to hold water on the inside. So why only 4 stars? Well, the top small pillow area doesn't connect to my tub due to the edging of my tub having a slight lip. The suction cups won't work unless the area is completely flat. So if the top edge of your tub isn't flat, it just won't connect. That being said I still got it to work and function; it just can't be as high on my tub as I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Kema

customer_reviews.title: This is the bath pillow to get, no matter ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the bath pillow to get, no matter what size the tub. It is generous and firm, bends where you need it, in every way a thought-out bath pillow. Mine stuck so well to the bathtub surface that I accidentally ripped the cover while un-sticking it. Guess what? Hills Point Industries replaced it in one day! Lifetime guarantee indeed. I cannot flatter the pillow or the provider more... Don't hesitate. This is the one.
customer_reviews.author: otis campbell

customer_reviews.title: It's... fine
customer_reviews.text: I mean... I don't know where all of these thrilled reviews are coming from... it's just a bi-fold, cheap vinyl cushion with crappy suction cups on the back (that slide down my tub every time I use it -- requires constant readjusting.) It's fine if you know that's what you're getting, but don't believe these reviews somehow pretending it's an epic, heavenly, nirvana-inducing bath pillow or something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder blade shredder!
customer_reviews.text: Bottom edge of pillow is hard’ ragged’ sharp and Very uncomfortable. Chews up my back at the shoulder blades. Have had a couple of these and don’t recall this problem. Maybe I received a defective unit. Will be looking for a comfortable alternative. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use my bath pillow. Excellent quality, and the suction cups stay in place! I came home to this....My dog has gone and helped himself to the pillow...like the person with the kitty who also loved this bath pillow. Cheers to ordering another bath pillow, at least I know it's a good quality?
customer_reviews.author: Gcoyne

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow, but cant get water out of it easily.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bath pillow, and yes the gorilla grip suction cups stick on really well. I like the size and the top part that leans back. The only issue is that water gets inside mine and is hard to get out. The pillow is noticeably heavier after a bath. The only place I can find to get water out, is behind one of the suction cup's base holes. There is a tiny hole that does a great job sucking water in, but is really difficult to get water out of. I live in a dry climate, so that helps dry it out between baths, but I could see this being an issue in a humid climate.
customer_reviews.author: Ritana

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of your tub surface.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a tub that put me at an uncomfortable angle to read. It is comfortable but be aware of your tub surface. If tub surface is non porous like smooth ceramic tile it should work fine. My tub appears smooth but is actually slightly porous. The suction cups do not work at all on the tub surface. Just double check the tub surface before you commit to buying. They probably work fine on the smooth tub surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband laughed at me when I ordered this, but he uses it almost every day. Quality and comfort level are on par with those you find in more expensive shops. I only wish that the bottom pillow was slightly longer (more rectangular in shape) so that I could get better support for myself. That is personal preference though. Don't let it deter you from trying this product out.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It is basic shape, nothing fluffy about it but it does what needs to be done! I like the simple shape and multiple suction cups to hold the pillow where I want it to stay. My tub has the flat edge where the top part of the pillow's suction cups can hold on to, and then the 2nd part of the pillow hangs into the tub to support the shoulder. So it fits perfectly. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Surf Cal

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is pretty firm but beats laying on the hard surface of the tub. The suction cups maybe strong or strong enough but they slide every where so you pretty much have to find a comfortable position and don’t move or the pillow will slide up and out from under you. I feel like there’s room for improvement here but maybe for the price it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: SweeTart85

customer_reviews.title: Great for relaxing in the tub!
customer_reviews.text: I used this the first night that I received it and it was so comfortable. I couldn't lean back in my bathtub and soak before this arrived because of the abrupt edge, which hurt my head and shoulders. Now I can lay back and enjoy. The surface of the pillow is very comfortable and doesn't feel cold or sticky. I love it! Stays stuck and doesn't slip or slide. Seems to resist mildew, too. 12/3/16 - I love my spa pillow so much that I just ordered another for my daughter's birthday. This makes soaking in the tub pure bliss!
customer_reviews.author: Blue DragonflyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The pillow didn't stick to the tub consistently. And while I know it's important to use a finger to release the suction, one of the suction cups tore away from the pillow. I found the whole experience frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 9 months
customer_reviews.text: This product was a Christmas gift and worked great for about 9 months. It was pretty comfortable and the suction power was great. About 9 months later it has lost some of it's suction power and there is some wear and tear at the seams. Considering the price of the item it was not expected to last forever, especially considering its use in the bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Dan and Renee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for about 2 weeks and so far I really like it. It is comfortable with the two sections of padding that cradle your neck and head. It's easy to change positions and still have plenty of padding behind you, whether you're sitting up, sinking down, or leaning back. The suction cups grab on easily and keep the pillow from moving around. You do need to take care when removing the pillow to gently pull up each suction cup individually (and not tug on the pillow itself) to avoid rips. Overall I am happy with this and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: G22

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bath pillow I have ever had. I have tried several different ones for the tub I have now and none of them would stay in place. This one stays until you take it off . It is super comfortable, making the bath that much better!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Bought early April. Currently early June. The pillow ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought early April. Currently early June. The pillow shape did not last long. Using it daily/ every other day and it has not held up. Going back to using $tree blow up pillow.
customer_reviews.author: katie wright

customer_reviews.title: Easy to attach and so comfortable!  It’s a game changer for me.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this bath pillow!! Taking a bath is one of my favorite ways to relax and treat myself to some comfort. But my bath is super uncomfortable and has a straight back that is rough to lean against. This bath pillow makes all the difference in the world. I’ve only used it once so far but I never wanted to get out. It was so easy to attach and remove and is honestly one of my favorite purchases in a while. I would highly recommend! It’s super super comfortable and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This thing has some major suction power. It's actually really comfortable. The way it felt when I got it, i was a little nervous it wasn't going to be what I had in mind. But I quickly installed it and sat it in the tub, fully clothed, and relaxed for 10 minutes haha. It has changed the way I take bubble baths. I can't believe I didn't get this sooner. It's easy to wash and dry. We've had one before it it would get so heavy with water and just fall off. This won't and hasn't been like that. Amazing bath pillow, for us
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t “fit” the neck curve in a hot tub
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my hot tub. It doesn’t work in the hot tub. The bend at the neck just doesn’t work with the design of hot tubs. It’s a good product, but it doesn’t fit the curve it needs to to function well in a hot tub. I put it in my deep soaking tub indoors. It’s good there but I’m in my hot tub more often so this doesn’t get much use. It didn’t fill the reason I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hohman

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this pillow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pillow for my wife for our new tub. She loves it. Much better than trying to use a towel and worry about keeping it dry. Pillow came within 2 days and is exactly what you would expect. We got the suction cups wet before attaching to tub and it seems very strong. Only been a couple days but we are very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful spa bath pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to provide her both support and comfort while taking a bath. She loves it because the suction cups really keep the pillow in place and the pillow is very comfortable while providing a good amount of support. This would be a valuable product for anyone that likes to soak in the bath tub.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Best bath pillow ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bath pillow I have ever had. I have already purchased backups and also some additional ones to use with pool floats. It is very comfortable and is super easy to clean just by wiping. Occasionally one of the suction cups will come off but it is easy to put back on.
customer_reviews.author: emylu

customer_reviews.title: Won't stick to curved surface
customer_reviews.text: It's most likely the shape of my tub that is the problem. I have a large whirl pool tub with a narrow ledge. The suction cups will not stuck to the curve of the tub's back rest. All well. It works if I sit up against it for back cushion but I can't really use it as a neck rest.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is the best that I have been able to find, but it just still does not stay attached to my tub. It does stay attached when I’m sitting in the tub, but it always falls down when not in use. It stays up while I’m bathing, which I guess is the point, but I usually have to put it back up each time I get in the tub. Better than most, but I just wish it stayed up all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was recommend by Amazon after I purchased a tub caddy. I thought it was a great idea and just ordered it. Our tub has a curve on the end and the inside packaging said it may not stick on curved surfaces. It barely stays on, but it does stay. Falls off if bumped, but when resting on the pillow it stays just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kestral55

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I got this based on all the good reviews but I found this pillow to be very hard and slippery when wet. It feels like there’s no pillow there and I’m just laying up against the back of the tub. I know everyone is different but can’t understand how so many people liked this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: A. Douthit

customer_reviews.title: Over a year later and it’s still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago to go with my bath bomb addiction and I’m so glad i did. I use it almost every day. It hasn’t developed any smell or mold or anything and is supportive and comfortable. The suction is very strong and it stays put. It’s easy to remove for cleaning. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: I am officially spoiled
customer_reviews.text: Of the bath pillows I have owned, this is my favorite. It is large enough to provide support and comfort without crowding my tub. It does not mildew. The suction is great. I like that I can attach it to the shower wall when I’m not using it.
customer_reviews.author: LadyAngela

customer_reviews.title: Material cold one body and didn't stick to tile surround
customer_reviews.text: It's relatively comfortable, but the angles are off for an old school tub where the back of tub butts right up to the wall, no good place to secure pillow. Also, wish material was something that didn't need to be submerged in warm water before contact with skin each time, if not it's cold to touch. I wouldn't buy again, but with different shape tub where pillow secures smoothly, I might...
customer_reviews.author: P. Unger

customer_reviews.title: Great Warranty Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Gorilla Grip Original bath pillow in August, 2017. The pillow was comfortable and stayed-put in the tub and my wife was happy - until a leak developed recently. I'm a skeptic, but I thought I'd try their 10 year - no hassle warranty. WOW, was I impressed! I received a replacement 3 days after sending an e-mail to customerservice@hillspointindustries.com Great warranty and GREAT Service.
customer_reviews.author: Ron R

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased several bath pillows and been disappointed with them all
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several bath pillows and been disappointed with them all. So I was slightly skeptical when I found this pillow and the low price. I will have to say, it's the best bath pillow that I've used. It's comfortable, has great suction, and is super easy to clean. I would highly recommend this item for purchasing. I am going to order two more to give as holiday gifts to my sister and mom.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Showalter

customer_reviews.title: It makes a great pillow, I've put a lot of pressure on ...
customer_reviews.text: This makes getting into the bath so much more enjoyable. I got a lot of use out of it during my pregnancy, I would step into a cold bathtub and lean back into a warm pad. No more cold back for me. It makes a great pillow, I've put a lot of pressure on it and it really hasn't slipped at all. So happy with my purchase of this pad. Can't wait until I can jump into the bathtub next!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: bath gift
customer_reviews.text: this is part of a bath gift set \i put together and the recipient loves it
customer_reviews.author: Laura Williams

customer_reviews.title: My baths are so much more enjoyable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bath pillow!!!! It makes my baths so much more enjoyable and fits perfectly in the bathtub. What I don’t like is how much water enters into the pillow so I did throw it away after a few months and bought a new one. Only because I am a germiphobe and didn’t want mold or anything growing inside. But I totally love this pillow and am happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Darby Dennis
